name: cloud-sdk-starter-app
description: Starter project using the SAP S/4HANA Cloud SDK and Express.js

scripts.ci-package: mkdir -p deployment/ && npm prune --production && cp -r node_modules dist package.json index.html deployment/
scripts.ci-backend-unit-test: nyc --extension .ts --report-dir ./s4hana_pipeline/reports/coverage-reports/ --reporter cobertura mocha -r ts-node/register test/unit-tests/*.spec.ts --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./s4hana_pipeline/reports/backend-unit/results.xml
scripts.ci-integration-test: nyc --extension .ts --report-dir ./s4hana_pipeline/reports/coverage-reports/ --reporter cobertura mocha -r ts-node/register test/integration-tests/*.spec.ts --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./s4hana_pipeline/reports/backend-integration/results.xml
